page.title: 01A DAY IN THE LIFE OF FIONA 1
page.content: At 7.30 A.M. I get up and get dressed. We have breakfast at 8.00. I usually have cereal for breakfast and lemon juice which is very sour. After that I have a wash, brush my hair, and put on my coat. By this time it's usually 8.25 A.M. The taxi comes at 8.30 A.M. It's only a quick drive up to school so we have about 25 mins playtime.At 9.00 A.M. we go into school. We have to read for half an hour. At 9.30 we have assembly. We sing and listen to a story. Mr Williams ( our headmaster) sometimes talks to us . Or if there is a new child Mr Williams introduces us in assembly.After that,we come back into the classroom and do maths.I'm on Beta 4.At 10.40 A.M. we have a break . We have have a drink of milk and go outside.At 11.00 A.M. we come into the classroom and do Welsh and English.At 12.10 P.M. we have dinner.
